name: WaitForTriggeredBuildsXPlat
description: Wait for the triggered builds - Cross Platform -
author: megoels

inputs.name: waitTagsList
inputs.label: Wait Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma-delimited list of tags for the step to wait, for example: tag1,tag2.

inputs.name: buildsAreInCurrentTeamProject
inputs.label: Wait for builds which are in the same team project (as this build)
inputs.helpMarkDown: True if the builds are in the same team project as this build.

inputs.name: teamProjectUri
inputs.label: Team Project URL (full URL)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full URL of the team project which contians the triggered builds, e.g: https://<ACCOUNTNAME>.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/<TEAMPROJECT>

inputs.name: customAuth
inputs.label: Custom Authentication (Endpoint)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access the build api via custom Endpoint. Set it to false for bearer token authorization using the System.AccessToken variable.

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The server generic endpoint, set the key -Password/Token Key- field to your API key.

inputs.name: timeOut
inputs.label: Timeout [minutes]
inputs.helpMarkDown: If timeout reached failing the step and moving on to the next step. An empty or zero value indicates an infinite timeout.

inputs.name: cancellingOnError
inputs.label: Cancel Build-Chain On Failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set it to true for canceling the build chain if error occurred on any build (the build chain is list of triggered builds which registered for wait by tag).

inputs.name: http_proxy
inputs.label: HTTP Proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the agent is behind Proxy and there's no environment variable then you can provide it here

inputs.name: https_proxy
inputs.label: HTTPS Proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the agent is behind Proxy and there's no environment variable then you can provide it here
